data.comment: The big names in today's match at Elland Road have now been confirmed.
The whistle has gone to start the match.
In the minute 1, Throw-in for Man City close to the penalty box.
Man City drive upfield and Kyle Walker gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Leeds defender.
Corner awarded to Man City.
In the minute 2, Mike Dean signals a Man City throw-in in Leeds's half.
Man City's Raheem Sterling gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Leeds have a goal kick.
In the minute 3, Free kick Man City.
Kevin De Bruyne (Man City) fires in a shot – and hits the post!
Man City have been awarded a corner by Mike Dean.
In the minute 4, Man City have been awarded a corner by Mike Dean.
Mike Dean blows against Man City's Raheem Sterling for offside.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 8, Man City to take a throw-in in Leeds territory.
Free kick for Leeds in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Man City in Leeds.
In the minute 10, In Leeds a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ball goes out of play for a Leeds goal kick.
Kevin De Bruyne (Man City) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 12, Corner awarded to Man City.
Ruben Dias (Man City) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Leeds.
In the minute 12, Mike Dean signals a free kick to Man City in their own half.
At Elland Road, Patrick Bamford has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Ferran Torres (Man City) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 13, Can Man City get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leeds's half?
Leeds awarded a free kick in their own half.
Leeds's Ezgjan Alioski attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 14, Mike Dean awards Man City a goal kick.
Free kick for Leeds in their own half.
In Leeds, Ferran Torres of Man City is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 16, Goal kick for Leeds at Elland Road.
Throw-in Man City.
Mike Dean awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 17, Raheem Sterling is on target to give Man City a 0-1 advantage.
Ferran Torres with an assist there.
Throw-in for Man City in the half of Leeds.
In the minute 19, Tyler Roberts for Leeds is whistled offside.
Leeds drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Ball safe as Man City is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 21, Kevin De Bruyne (Man City) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Man City have been awarded a corner by Mike Dean.
Man City surge into the attack at Elland Road but Aymeric Laporte’s header is off-target.
In the minute 21, Goal kick for Leeds at Elland Road.
Phil Foden for Man City gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Leeds.
In the minute 23, Mike Dean signals a Man City throw-in in Leeds's half.
Throw-in for Man City in their own half.
Leeds's Patrick Bamford breaks free at Elland Road. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 24, Ball goes out of play for a Man City goal kick.
Throw-in for Leeds at Elland Road.
Man City awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 26, Mike Dean awards the away team a throw-in.
Mike Dean signals a throw-in for Leeds, close to Man City's area.
Mike Dean awards Man City a goal kick.
In the minute 30, Man City have a goal kick.
Can Leeds get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Man City's half?
Man City's Raheem Sterling is whistled for offside at Elland Road.
In the minute 35, Mike Dean signals a free kick to Leeds in their own half.
Throw-in Leeds.
Leeds awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 36, Benjamin Mendy is booked for the away team.
Stuart Dallas gets his shot on target but fails to score for Leeds.
Corner awarded to Leeds.
In the minute 38, Corner awarded to Leeds.
Man City are pushing forward but Phil Foden's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Leeds at Elland Road.
In the minute 41, Free kick for Leeds in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Man City awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 43, Mike Dean signals a free kick to Leeds in their own half.
Leeds have been awarded a corner by Mike Dean.
Ball goes out of play for a Man City goal kick.
In the minute 45, At Elland Road the fourth official shows that 1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Leeds awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Leeds Leeds drive forward through Luke Ayling. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
The second-half has started.
In the minute 46, Leeds's Patrick Bamford gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Man City defender.
Leeds have been awarded a corner by Mike Dean.
Marcelo Bielsa (Leeds) is making a first substitution, with Ian Poveda replacing Ezgjan Alioski.
Man City awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 47, Throw-in for Man City in the half of Leeds.
Can Man City capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Leeds's half?
Ball safe as Man City is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 49, Leeds to take a throw-in in Man City territory.
Throw-in for Man City in their own half.
Can Leeds get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Man City's half?
In the minute 52, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Man City have a goal kick.
Mike Dean signals a free kick to Leeds in their own half.
In the minute 53, Throw-in for Leeds at Elland Road.
Mike Dean signals a free kick to Man City.
Raheem Sterling (Man City) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 55, Mike Dean awards Leeds a goal kick.
Ball safe as Man City is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Marcelo Bielsa is making the team's second substitution at Elland Road with Rodrigo Moreno replacing Tyler Roberts.
In the minute 57, Free kick for Man City in the half of Leeds.
Throw-in for Man City in the half of Leeds.
Important block from the Man City defence as Rodrigo Moreno fires in a strike for Leeds.
In the minute 59, Corner awarded to Leeds.
Rodrigo Moreno levels the score at 1-1.
Mike Dean signals a Man City throw-in in Leeds's half.
In the minute 61, Throw-in for Leeds in their own half.
In Leeds a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Man City have been awarded a corner by Mike Dean.
In the minute 63, Man City to take a throw-in in Leeds territory.
Kalvin Phillips for Leeds drives towards goal at Elland Road. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In Leeds Man City attack through Kevin De Bruyne. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 64, It's a goal kick for the home team in Leeds.
The away team replace Ferran Torres with Bernardo Silva.
Man City's Riyad Mahrez breaks free at Elland Road. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 66, Ball goes out of play for a Leeds goal kick.
Man City's Riyad Mahrez gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Leeds have a goal kick.
In the minute 67, Can Leeds get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Man City's half?
Mike Dean signals a free kick to Leeds.
Leeds attack and a brilliant heading opportunity is created for Liam Cooper but the ball cannons into the bar!
In the minute 68, Liam Cooper for the home team is judged to be offside.
Mike Dean signals a Leeds throw-in in Man City's half.
In Leeds, Rodrigo Moreno (Leeds) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
In the minute 70, Corner awarded to Leeds.
Free kick for Man City in their own half.
Nathan Ake is on a sub for Benjamin Mendy for Man City.
In the minute 73, Helder Costa (Leeds) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Leeds.
Man City push forward at Elland Road and Phil Foden gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Leeds defence.
In the minute 75, Man City have been awarded a corner by Mike Dean.
Throw-in for Man City in the half of Leeds.
Leif Davis is replacing Mateusz Klich for Leeds at Elland Road.
In the minute 77, Fernandinho is replacing Riyad Mahrez for the away team.
Mike Dean awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Leeds at Elland Road.
In the minute 79, Man City awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Leeds.
Kevin De Bruyne (Man City) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 81, Fernandinho for Man City gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Leeds.
Man City are coming forward and Bernardo Silva gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 82, Mike Dean awards Leeds a goal kick.
In Leeds, Bernardo Silva of Man City is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Man City's Raheem Sterling misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 85, Goal kick for Leeds at Elland Road.
Patrick Bamford of Leeds smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to Man City.
In the minute 88, Man City have been awarded a corner by Mike Dean.
Raheem Sterling (Man City) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Mike Dean awards Leeds a goal kick.
Free kick Man City.
Man City have been awarded a corner by Mike Dean.
The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Leeds in their own half.
Mike Dean signals a free kick to Man City in their own half.
Free kick for Man City in the half of Leeds.
Ball goes out of play for a Leeds goal kick.
That's full-time at Elland Road. The final score is 1-1.
Stuart Dallas (Leeds) gets a yellow card.
